error.multipleTabs: Offline functionality isn't available on multiple tabs!
error.unimplemented: Your browser doesn't support offline functionality!
error.auth/credential-already-in-use: This credential is already associated with a different user account.
error.auth/email-already-in-use: The email address is already in use by another account.
error.auth/wrong-password: The password is invalid or the user does not have a password.
error.auth/too-many-requests: We have blocked all requests from this device due to unusual activity. Try again later.
error.auth/user-not-found: There is no user record corresponding to this identifier. The user may have been deleted.
error.auth/user-disabled: The user account has been disabled by an administrator.
error.auth/user-mismatch: The supplied credentials do not correspond to the previously signed in user.
error.auth/weak-password: The password must be 6 characters long or more.
